website_summaries.verdict: The Huawei MateBook is one of the thinnest and lightest 12-inch Windows tablets you can buy, but be prepared to add a lot of necessary accessories to the shopping cart when you order one.
pros: One of the thinnest and lightest Windows tablets on the market
cons: Case, dock, and pen not included
No rear camera or SD slot

customer_reviews.title: good quality and design, but poor battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality and design. It is the best among all current windows tablets. I had the m3 4GB version and it was fast enough for daily tasks. Web pages load right away. The biggest problem for me is the poor battery life. I'm only getting 4.5 hours battery life with 50% screen brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Starfall

customer_reviews.title: Best budget 2 in 1 laptop & tablet draw recommended 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Best 2 in 1 drawing laptop budget You get solid specs for low power tdp Enough for daily usage watching light work Screen resolution so perfect IPS 2k Battery so good around 6-7 hours on light use I bought pen separately And enjoyed drawing on this tablet pressure sensitivity 2049 level great for tablet same as Surface pro 4 Also keyboard bought separately Thank you Huawei 👏👏👏

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my girlfriend for her birthday, she loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend for her birthday, she loves it. Rather than spending almost twice for Surface, get this and basically get the same performance and quality. Yet, in my opinion Huawei did the better job with it's design and simplicity. It works fast, very power efficient and has a slick design. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ata B.

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight, excellent look, feel and performance. Amazing! :-)
customer_reviews.text: My key likes: very light weight, excellent look, feel and performance. Has all the functionalities I need for my work and personal use. Simply amazing! ;-) Plenty of storage and processing speed for typical business and home use. Finger print sensor too... Wohoo! Few dislikes: hard to find accessories (case cover), most of them shipped from China, takes like 4~6 weeks to receive them. You definitely have to buy the MateBook portfolio keyboard, MatePen and MateDock USB-C multi-port adapter. Even with all that you're paying less than other 2-1 Laptop/Tables. Everything works great!
customer_reviews.author: Erick B.

customer_reviews.title: So I dont recommend getting this even it goes super sale
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with a defected screen which doesn't response since I opened it. I though it was a driver issue and hard reset the device but no luck. It seems to be that this particular product has a 70% chance of getting defected ones judging from other reviews and my own experience. So I don't recommend getting this even it goes super sale. Instead just save more money and get the more known appropriate better reviewed brands. Not to mention that this tablet doesn't support MS ink pen and from what I heard only Wacom bamboo ink can also work with it if you cannot afford the real Huawei Pen anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Glehp

customer_reviews.title: The form factor is beautiful. But
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: the C drive is nearly full after just 1 year of service because of the way Huawei partitions the drive. The secondary drive can only be used to save files. The c drive, which started out at 80 gigs, has no more room for my applications. I wish I'd bought a Surface device instead. The form factor is beautiful. But, the hardware is cheap. The screen flickers a lot. The M5 is under-powered. Oh yeah, the harddrive is partitioned into two parts, and it cannot be changed. There's virtually no hardware support for this tablet.

We got the cover, the pen and the MateDock (Which we haven't used but it seemed important). Windows 10 really shines on a touch screen and the pen makes it that much better. The keyboard feels good and the package looks great with the cover on. I do recommend this off-brand choice.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, but flawed
customer_reviews.text: The design is fantastic. It's easy and comfortable to hold, and the screen is beautiful and responsive. It's quite snappy, too, for only having a core m inside. It does get quite warm when using it though. There is a bit of could whine with it too, which is unfortunate if you have hearing strong enough to detect it like I do. Battery life isn't good at all, which totally takes away from the portability aspect. It does charge quickly (relatively speaking), which sort of makes up for it. I ended up returning it because all these little problems add up and it just wasn't worth the price, as beautiful as it is.

product_meta.title: Huawei MateBook Signature Edition 2 in 1 PC Tablet, 4+128GB / Intel Core m5 (Space Gray)
product_meta.description: CPU:Intel Core m5| Capacity:4 GB RAM, 128 GB SSD| Style:Tablet Only| Color:Space GrayThe Huawei MateBook is the perfect stylish companion for your professional and everyday needs. Beautifully designed, this 2-in-1 Windows 10 PC has the power to get the job done. Weighing in at only 1.41 pounds, the 0.27-inch thin MateBook is accentuated by a premium metal unibody, thin bezel, and 12” display. Compact and powered by a 6th Gen Intel Core m processor, the MateBook is perfect for high performance on-the-go.
feature_bullets: 2-in-1 PC running Windows 10 Home with a 6th Generation Intel Core m5 processor
World class security with a ultra-fast fingerprint sensor on the side that lets you unlock with a single touch
12” IPS display with 2160x1440 resolution with 160° wide viewing angle and accurate colors for watching your favorite videos and editing photos
Sleek and lightweight design is less than 1.5 lbs. and 6.9mm thin for a truly on-the-go experience
Compatible with Huawei MatePen with 2048 levels of pressure sensitive writing, MateDock for multifunctional connections, and backlit Portfolio Keyboard
